attributes.action: Review and regulate car insurers price hikes.
attributes.additional_details:
Post Code punishment needs reviewing, the poorest areas are paying the highest premiums. 
I have had to give up my car because my insurance with no claims or traffic offences, doubled in one year, it is unjust.
attributes.background: Cap the amount of increase Insurer's can raise policy prices for customers with no claims.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Hold a Public Inquiry into the increasing cost of car insurance in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/660820
